item.title: Introduction to regular expressions
item.author: adel.rahmani+dinkumdata@gmail.com (Adel Rahmani)
item.description: Jamie Zawinski: Some people, when confronted with a problem, think "I know, I'll use regular expressions". Now they have two problems. 1.
